messages.title: Vote Robert Mackenzie for a Local Voice!
messages.content: I am delighted and honoured to have been selected as the Conservative Party candidate for Ross, Skye and Lochaber for the General Election on 8th June.

This election comes at a critically important juncture in the history of the United Kingdom. We have voted to leave the European Union and only the Conservatives have the strength, commitment and resolve to carry out the democratic will of the people and act in the national interest to get the best deal for the whole of the United Kingdom.

We continue to face the threat from the SNP of yet another divisive independence referendum and only the Scottish Conservatives have the backbone to defend our precious union with England, Northern Ireland and Wales.

In our home communities the SNP are failing our young people, with falling literacy levels in our schools and longer waiting times in our hospitals. They constantly blame such problems on Westminster and austerity, while failing to use the powers they have at Holyrood to raise revenue and allocate resources effectively.

It is time to end the uncertainty and elect a strong and stable Conservative government that will continue to strengthen our economy, so that we can finance the world-class schools, hospitals, social care services, infrastructure, defence forces and security services we all expect; sometimes take for granted, and too infrequently take a moment to cherish.
Please vote for me, Robert Mackenzie, on 8th June. I will be the strong and constructive voice that you want in Westminster, standing up for our fragile rural economy and for our United Kingdom.

I believe in fairness, freedom of individual choice, tolerance, working hard and to the best of your ability, living within your means, taking responsibility for your own actions, contributing to your community, speaking out against injustice and respecting the rule of law.

I believe in equality of opportunity and in creating opportunities for everyone to excel at something. And I believe that the Conservatives are the only party that can say that you can do anything, whoever you are and wherever you come from.

I want to help make that a reality for all those who aspire to a better life and just need the right support when it matters and the encouragement to keep on trying, even when the odds are stacked against them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strengthening our economy to finance the world-class schools, hospitals, social care services, infrastructure, defence forces and security services we all expect.
Addressing falling literacy levels in our schools with effective resource allocation.
Reducing longer waiting times in our hospitals and financing healthcare through a strong economy.
Carrying out the democratic will of the people to get the best deal for the whole of the UK after leaving the European Union.
Defending the union with England, Northern Ireland, and Wales against divisive independence referendums from SNP.
Electing a strong and stable Conservative government to address uncertainties and allocate resources effectively.

community.content: A local farmer and owner of a growing farm diversification business, I was born in Dingwall and brought up on my family’s farm in Easter Ross.

leaflet.personalStatement: A local farmer and owner of a growing farm diversification business, I was born in Dingwall and brought up on my family’s farm in Easter Ross. After graduating with an honours degree in Agricultural Science, as well as a degree in law, I returned to the farm in 2010 and started adding value to the crops grown there. I now export my products to the rest of the UK, as well as to Canada, Europe, the Middle East and Asia.

examples: In our home communities the SNP are failing our young people, with falling literacy levels in our schools and longer waiting times in our hospitals.
Please vote for me, Robert Mackenzie, on 8th June. I will be the strong and constructive voice that you want in Westminster, standing up for our fragile rural economy and for our United Kingdom.

I believe in fairness, freedom of individual choice, tolerance, working hard and to the best of your ability, living within your means, taking responsibility for your own actions, contributing to your community, speaking out against injustice and respecting the rule of law.

I believe in equality of opportunity and in creating opportunities for everyone to excel at something. And I believe that the Conservatives are the only party that can say that you can do anything, whoever you are and wherever you come from.

I want to help make that a reality for all those who aspire to a better life and just need the right support when it matters and the encouragement to keep on trying, even when the odds are stacked against them.
A local farmer and owner of a growing farm diversification business, I was born in Dingwall and brought up on my family’s farm in Easter Ross.
After graduating with an honours degree in Agricultural Science, as well as a degree in law, I returned to the farm in 2010 and started adding value to the crops grown there.
I now export my products to the rest of the UK, as well as to Canada, Europe, the Middle East and Asia.

We continue to face the threat from the SNP of yet another divisive independence referendum and only the Scottish Conservatives have the backbone to defend our precious union with England, Northern Ireland and Wales.
They constantly blame such problems on Westminster and austerity, while failing to use the powers they have at Holyrood to raise revenue and allocate resources effectively.
A local farmer and owner of a growing farm diversification business, I was born in Dingwall and brought up on my family’s farm in Easter Ross.
In our home communities the SNP are failing our young people, with falling literacy levels in our schools and longer waiting times in our hospitals.

We continue to face the threat from the SNP of yet another divisive independence referendum and only the Scottish Conservatives have the backbone to defend our precious union with England, Northern Ireland and Wales.

It is time to end the uncertainty and elect a strong and stable Conservative government that will continue to strengthen our economy, so that we can finance the world-class schools, hospitals, social care services, infrastructure, defence forces and security services we all expect.

I now export my products to the rest of the UK, as well as to Canada, Europe, the Middle East and Asia.
